attributes.action: Remove age requiremnts of spouse visa for non-eu national married to British Citizen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Sir,
I am a British citizen and married to a non-EU national. We are currently living in Dublin, Ireland as UK has changed its law and age requirements for a spouse visa has been changed from 18 to 21.
My wife is currently 20 years old and therefore she can not apply for UK visa and we have no choice except living away from family and friends.
Thanks to Irish authorities that they had no issue in giving my wife visa but I am really disappointed that I cannot go back to my own country as my wife is 20years old.
Can I please request that this age requirements should be removed so that we and many other British citizen can live happily with their families in their own country.
Thanks and Regards,
Abbas Khan
